publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5908.1 Robin Harper: Aquacultureâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5908) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, insert at end ", and urges the Scottish Government to phase out the rearing of smolt in freshwater open net-pens in systems that contain native migratory fish and replace both fresh and sea water net farming with closed containment systems as soon as possible."
